attributes.additional_details:
In the late 1960's we had a campaign for buying British made goods and supporting British industry.  Can we again adopt this campaign and get the country behind our great ideas, skills and innovations?
Make the public aware of all products and services that are British.
Put Union Flags on all products that are made in Britain.
Encourage a POSITIVE media campaign on British products and innovations.
We have a great Britain let's get behind her and be proud of ourselves and our achievements.
